Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory43.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bianca', 3: 'Remember the signal transmitters from before? These are from the same batch as those.', 4: '3'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: 'Our location was in broad daylight all this time.', 4: '3'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'The enemy launched a full-frontal attack on us, knowing full well about the time lag?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: "Likely, but the target's identity is still unknown.", 4: '3'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Roland', 3: "That's just a little device in the old world, made to monitor the location of machines.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Roland', 3: "Just another little use of this locational function. Originally for tracking Kamui's exact location, but somehow it's baited a whole flock of uninteresting prey.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: 'We meet again, Babylonians. ', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Everyone, raise your guards! This is an Ascendant!', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Roland', 3: "This time, you shan't get in the way.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: '...Watch your back.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: 'Th-thank you... Watanabe?!', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'No time for this. Focus on the situation.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: 'What... is this machine?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: "It's a Musashi.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: "I thought you'd long since ran off.", 4: '3'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "I don't like owing favors. And also, we've got some unfinished business with the Ascendants.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: "You aren't afraid of being caught by me?", 4: '3'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Still better than losing my chance to repay my debt.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: "Very well. Now's not the time to argue, and we do require your help.", 4: '3'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "So I'll contain the target within your sniping range?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "How do I know if you aren't just gonna wipe me out along with him?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: '...You have a terrible sense of humor.', 4: '3'}
